plot: A destitute man finds a piece of magic chalk, so that whatever he draws becomes real. He enters a colorful unreal world of his own making. Finally he draws his perfect woman, but she turns out to be not what he expected.
title: The Red Chalk
plot_es: A destitute man finds a piece of magic chalk, so that whatever he draws becomes real. He enters a colorful unreal world of his own making. Finally he draws his perfect woman, but she turns out to be not what he expected.
plot_en: A destitute man finds a piece of magic chalk, so that whatever he draws becomes real. He enters a colorful unreal world of his own making. Finally he draws his perfect woman, but she turns out to be not what he expected.
